name: Tofu Engine (Demo)
description:
For the courious fellow #gamedev and #indiedev out there, here's a sneak preview of (some) of the features that are present in #tofuengine, in the form of a very basic #oldskool demo. :)

If you have some spare minutes, just download and launch it. Then, please, report any issue you'll encounter (hopefully, none).

Thanks! :)
